root.name: Cubixx HD
root.description: Developer Laughing Jackal's first PS3 game and the sequel to the PSP Mini. Cubixx HD is a more fully featured take on Cubixx, with new enemies, 5 new game modes, 7-player local co-op and deathmatch and 50 bespoke challenges with trophies and 200 challenge medals to win. It was released on PSN on the 17th August in Europe and the 20th September in North America.
